titleStmt.title: Mistaken justice: or, innocence condemn'd, in the person of Francis Newland, lately executed at Tyburn, for the barbarous murther of Mr. Francis Thomas. Being a true account of the evidence against him, of the truth of his case, and of his behaviour, from the time of his sentence, till his execution; attested by divers credible persons.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Richard Smith, at the Angel near Lincolns-Inn Back-Gate, going into the fields,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the Angel near Lincolns-Inn Back-Gate, going into the fields
